unnormalised: Hehe Bhaia, bapla do "The Grand Plaza, Ballroom A, Andheri (E), Mumbai, 400069" re menaka-a se? Bari marang r' sajaw-sambaraw ge injanjom-kana! Aasa-a-ing, parking do pura-ge menak-a tahen-koa, baKhan do plot no. 7 re golmaal do pakka-ge hoyok-ge-ya!
normalised: ᱮ ᱵᱷᱟᱭ, ᱵᱤᱦᱟ ᱫᱚ "ᱫᱟ ᱜᱽᱨᱮᱸᱰ ᱯᱞᱟᱡᱟ, ᱵᱚᱞᱨᱩᱢ ᱮ, ᱟᱸᱫᱷᱮᱨᱤ (ᱤ), ᱢᱩᱢᱵᱟᱭ, 400069" ᱨᱮ ᱢᱮᱱᱟᱜᱼᱟ? ᱥᱟᱱᱰᱟᱭ ᱟᱸᱡᱚᱢᱚᱜ ᱠᱟᱱᱟ! ᱟᱥᱚᱜ ᱠᱟᱱᱟᱹᱧ ᱯᱟᱨᱠᱤᱝ ᱫᱚ ᱯᱩᱨᱟᱹ ᱢᱮᱱᱟᱜᱼᱟ, ᱵᱟᱝᱠᱷᱟᱱ ᱯᱞᱚᱴ ᱱᱚᱢᱵᱚᱨ ᱮᱭᱟᱭ ᱨᱮ ᱜᱚᱸᱫᱚᱞ ᱫᱚ ᱯᱟᱠᱟ ᱦᱩᱭᱩᱜᱼᱟ!
text: Hehe Bhaia, bapla do "The Grand Plaza, Ballroom A, Andheri (E), Mumbai, 400069" re menaka-a se? Bari marang r' sajaw-sambaraw ge injanjom-kana! Aasa-a-ing, parking do pura-ge menak-a tahen-koa, baKhan do plot no. 7 re golmaal do pakka-ge hoyok-ge-ya!
